rubah variable callback ke payload

msg.callback = msg.payload;

name: query pengambilan data dari database
func:
msg.query = `from(bucket: "datalogger_kelembapan&gas")
    |> range(start: -5m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gas co" or r["_measurement"] == "gas lpg" or r["_measurement"] == "kelembapan" or r["_measurement"] == "smoke" or r["_measurement"] == "suhu(celcius)" or r["_measurement"] == "suhu(fahrenheit)")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
    |> last()`
return msg;

name: query pengambilan data dari database
func:
msg.query = `from(bucket: "datalogger_kelembapan&gas")
    |> range(start: -5m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gas co" or r["_measurement"] == "gas lpg" or r["_measurement"] == "kelembapan" or r["_measurement"] == "smoke" or r["_measurement"] == "suhu(celcius)" or r["_measurement"] == "suhu(fahrenheit)")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
    |> limit(n: 10)`
return msg;

query pengambilan data dari database
func:
msg.query = `from(bucket: "datalogger_kelembapan&gas")
    |> range(start: -5m)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gas co" or r["_measurement"] == "gas lpg" or r["_measurement"] == "kelembapan" or r["_measurement"] == "smoke" or r["_measurement"] == "suhu(celcius)" or r["_measurement"] == "suhu(fahrenheit)")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")`
return msg;
